Mac

Mac

TOGG

USJ

USJ

name:
Apple
fn+FK
title: Apple Fn/Globe key for the keyboard that dosen't have F1-12 keys. F1-12 keys can be mapped on top row. When mac mode is off, It simulates mac fn functions.

name:

KANA
title: Toggle send かな and 英数

RC
BTN
title: The button located on radial controller

name:
RC
CCW
title: Counter clockwise rotation of the radial controller. While pressing shift key, the rotation speed becomes slow 1/4 fine mode

name:
RC
CW
title: Clockwise rotation of the radial controller, While pressing shift key, the rotation speed becomes slow 1/4 fine mode
